attributes.action: Make masks compulsory in all secondary schools to limit the spread of Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to review the policy, as it would help to prevent a second wave and keep the students safe as well as their parents/guardians. Also not all schools are big enough to enforce social distancing rules, and so mask would be the next preventative measure.
attributes.background: We want the government to review their policy on masks in schools. We as students, parents, guardians and teachers think that it would be a lot safer, if it was mandatory to wear masks in school, and it would decrease the likelihood of the spread of Covid19 through out schools all over the country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330227
